article_html: Filipino bakers at the Bunny Baker Cafe have baked a life-size Manny Pacquiao cake as a tribute to the Filipino boxing icon. The 70 kilogram cake is worth $4,000 and took a week to prepare, bake and assemble. Zach Yonzons, creative director and owner of the cafe, said “Manny Pacquiao is world class, so we wanted to do something equally world class and the only way to do that is to create a cake that was extraordinary.” The cake will be served to the cafe’s customers after the fight
text: Filipino bakers at the Bunny Baker Cafe have baked a life-size Manny Pacquiao cake as a tribute to the Filipino boxing icon. title: Sport picture of the day: cake of the century
